languages.text: "Ты же не собираешься заключать сделку с этим хитрым ублюдком? Уверяю, это верный способ сдохнуть — чего у выродка не отнять, так это коварства. Договорись выменять у него кружку воды на линкор, и вот у тебя уже ни воды, ни линкора, зато много дырок в голове".

"You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."
languages.original_text: "Ты же не собираешься заключать сделку с этим хитрым ублюдком? Уверяю, это верный способ сдохнуть — чего у выродка не отнять, так это коварства. Договорись выменять у него кружку воды на линкор, и вот у тебя уже ни воды, ни линкора, зато много дырок в голове".

He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “你不会是打算和这个狡猾的畜生做交易吧？给你个忠告：如果这么做，你必死无疑。你根本想象不出这个畜生脑子里装着什么样的诡计。他会说服你，让你以为你手里的水可以换到一艘战舰。结果你一眨眼，战舰没了，水也没了，你只剩下个被打满了洞的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: “你不会是打算和这个狡猾的畜生做交易吧？给你个忠告：如果这么做，你必死无疑。你根本想象不出这个畜生脑子里装着什么样的诡计。他会说服你，让你以为你手里的水可以换到一艘战舰。结果你一眨眼，战舰没了，水也没了，你只剩下个被打满了洞的脑袋。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「まさかこの狡猾な化け物と取引をしろと？そんなことをすれば私は確実に死ぬ。この化け物は信じられないほど悪知恵を働かせる。一杯の水と戦艦を交換するよう説得され、気づいたら水も戦艦も手に入らず、頭に風穴を開けられている羽目になります」
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: 「まさかこの狡猾な化け物と取引をしろと？そんなことをすれば私は確実に死ぬ。この化け物は信じられないほど悪知恵を働かせる。一杯の水と戦艦を交換するよう説得され、気づいたら水も戦艦も手に入らず、頭に風穴を開けられている羽目になります」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «No estará pensando en hacer un trato con esa taimada bestia, ¿verdad? Porque es una forma segura de morir. La astucia de esa criatura no tiene límites. Puede convencerle para intercambiar un vaso de agua por una nave de guerra, y, un instante después, se encuentra sin agua, sin nave y con la cabeza como un colador».
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: «No estará pensando en hacer un trato con esa taimada bestia, ¿verdad? Porque es una forma segura de morir. La astucia de esa criatura no tiene límites. Puede convencerle para intercambiar un vaso de agua por una nave de guerra, y, un instante después, se encuentra sin agua, sin nave y con la cabeza como un colador».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

languages.text: « J'espère que vous n'envisagez pas de conclure un accord avec ce fourbe. Si c'est le cas, permettez-moi de vous dire que ce serait signer votre arrêt de mort. Cette immonde créature est plus rusée que vous semblez le croire. Il vous convaincra d'échanger un verre d'eau contre un vaisseau de combat, et en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire, vous vous retrouverez sans eau, sans vaisseau et la tête criblée de trous. »
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous n'envisagez pas de conclure un accord avec ce fourbe. Si c'est le cas, permettez-moi de vous dire que ce serait signer votre arrêt de mort. Cette immonde créature est plus rusée que vous semblez le croire. Il vous convaincra d'échanger un verre d'eau contre un vaisseau de combat, et en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire, vous vous retrouverez sans eau, sans vaisseau et la tête criblée de trous. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa eine Abmachung mit dieser raffinierten Bestie treffen, oder? Ich gebe Euch einen guten Rat: Das ist der sicherste Weg zum Tod. Diese Brut kennt Schliche, das glaubt Ihr nicht. Er bringt Euch dazu, ein Glas Wasser gegen ein Kampfschiff einzutauschen, dann blinzelt ihr einmal und habt dann weder Wasser noch ein Kampfschiff, sondern nur einen Kopf voller Einschusslöcher."
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa eine Abmachung mit dieser raffinierten Bestie treffen, oder? Ich gebe Euch einen guten Rat: Das ist der sicherste Weg zum Tod. Diese Brut kennt Schliche, das glaubt Ihr nicht. Er bringt Euch dazu, ein Glas Wasser gegen ein Kampfschiff einzutauschen, dann blinzelt ihr einmal und habt dann weder Wasser noch ein Kampfschiff, sondern nur einen Kopf voller Einschusslöcher."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Bu sinsi hayvanla anlaşma yapmayı planlamıyorsun, değil mi? Bu görmüş geçirmiş adamın sözlerine kulak ver: Kendini öldürteceksin. Yaratıkta öyle üçkâğıtlar var ki akla hayale gelmez. Seni bir bardak su karşılığı ona bir savaş gemisi vermeye ikna edebilir, sonra da gözünü kırptığın anda ne su kalır ne de savaş gemisi. Bir tek delik deşik olmuş kafan kalır."
languages.original_text: "You're not thinking of striking a deal with this crafty beast, are you? A word to the wise: it's the surest way to die. That spawn has wiles like you wouldn't believe. He convinces you to trade a cup of water for a battleship, then you blink, and you've got no water, no battleship, only a head shot full of holes."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sinsi hayvanla anlaşma yapmayı planlamıyorsun, değil mi? Bu görmüş geçirmiş adamın sözlerine kulak ver: Mutlak ölüm demektir. Yaratıkta öyle üçkâğıtlar var ki aklına hayaline gelmez. Seni bir bardak su karşılığı ona bir savaş gemisi vermeye ikna edebilir ve gözünü kırptığın anda da ne su kalır, ne de savaş gemisi. Tek kalan, delik deşik bir kafadır."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
